original_text: So we fix our eyes not on what is seen, but on what is unseen, since what is seen is temporary, but what is unseen is eternal.
korean_text: 우리가 주목하는 것은 보이는 것이 아니요 보이지 않는 것이니 보이는 것은 잠깐이요 보이지 않는 것은 영원함이라

sentences.original_text: So we fix our eyes not on what is seen
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 보이는 것에 눈을 고정하지 않고

sentences.original_text: since what is seen is temporary
but what is unseen is eternal
